# Question 5 from Assignment02
foobar <- function(value) {
  if (value %% 15 == 0) {
    result <- "foobar"
  } else if (value %% 3 == 0){
    result <- "foo"
  } else if (value %% 5 == 0) {
    result <- "bar"
  } else {
    result <- "Not a multiple of 3, 5, or 15"
  }

  return(result)
}

foobar(5)
foobar(3)
foobar(15)
foobar(60)
foobar(-5)
